channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report E-2024110396
item.description:
Report E-2024110396

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-22T12:30:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-15
  • City: LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal UVG experienced a UN2735 Sewer Guard 210 XHB Hardener Part A release from a 55-gallon metal drum. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1-gallon of product released to a 4’ x 4’ area of the trailer floor and a 4’ x 4’ area of the concrete dock. The drum was damaged due to rubbing against other freight or the trailer wall and was patched with tape prior to the contractors’ arrival. The damaged drum was placed into an 85-gallon poly overpack. Absorbents were deployed and worked into the impacted areas. All impacted absorbents and cleanup debris were containerized into a 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
